check_box.name: apply_immediate_check
check_box.label: Apply immediately
check_box.tool_tip: When this box is checked, any selection in the above list causes the selected items to be applied. The final/definitive selection is still done by hitting the 'Select' button, and the 'Cancel' button can still be used to cancel the operation.

button.name: select_btn
button.label: Select
button.tool_tip: Press this button to execute the operation, using the selected inventory item(s) in the list.

button.name: close_btn
button.label: Cancel
button.tool_tip: Press this button to cancel the selection operation.
